<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/rbac/endpoint"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve the resource group assigned to a specific endpoint.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"endpoint","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The endpoint to query."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response with the resource group assigned to the endpoint. Empty array if endpoint is not assigned to any resource group.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}},"400":{"description":"The request was malformed or invalid.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrGeneric"}}}},"401":{"description":"The provided authentication credentials were invalid."},"403":{"description":"The authenticated user does not have permission to access the requested resource."},"413":{"description":"The request payload is too large.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrGeneric"}}}},"500":{"description":"An internal server error occurred. >
